title: Matchsafe, "Tavern Scene", late 19th century
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Rectangular, rounded corners, featuring raised decoration of 3 men in tavern setting, possibly 17th century, seated at table and appearing to be throwing dice. Lid hinged on side. Striker in recess on bottom. Monogram on reverse. Lid hinged on side. Striker on bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Tavern Scene", late 19th century.
late 19th century. Silver. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1978-146-224.
